title: Here's a reading list of 20 articles focusing on the security, privacy, and copyright aspects of large language models (LLMs). These articles span recent years up to 2024 and cover various perspectives and developments in the field
**"Security Implications of Large Language Models"**
**"Privacy Risks in the Deployment of Large Language Models"**
**"Copyright Challenges in the Era of Large Language Models"**
**"Adversarial Attacks on Large Language Models: A Survey"**
**"Mitigating Privacy Risks in Large Language Models"**
**"Ethical and Legal Considerations for Large Language Models"**
**"The Impact of Large Language Models on Intellectual Property Law"**
**"Securing Large Language Models Against Data Poisoning"**
**"Privacy-Preserving Techniques for Large Language Models"**
container-title: IEEE Transactions on Information Forensics and Security

title: **"Copyright Infringement and Fair Use in AI-Generated Content"**
**"Large Language Models and the GDPR: Compliance Challenges"**
**"Robustness of Large Language Models to Adversarial Inputs"**
**"Legal Implications of AI-Generated Texts: A Copyright Perspective"**
container-title: Journal of Intellectual Property Law & Practice
**"Privacy-Preserving Machine Learning: Techniques and Applications"** - Communications of the ACM

title: **"Security Vulnerabilities in Transformer-Based Models"**
**"The Role of Large Language Models in Data Privacy"**
**"AI and Copyright: Navigating the Legal Landscape"**
container-title: Columbia Journal of Law & the Arts

title: **"Adversarial Robustness in Natural Language Processing"**
**"Privacy and Security in AI: Challenges and Solutions"**
**"The Future of Copyright in the Age of AI"**
These articles should provide a comprehensive overview of the current and emerging issues related to the security, privacy, and copyright aspects of large language models
